thread.title: Paul Scholes has backed Jose Mourinho as the new king of Old Trafford… having hated former manager Louis van Gaal

author: fnathan
title: Paul Scholes has backed Jose Mourinho as the new king of Old Trafford… having hated former manager Louis van Gaal
text:
EFL mour like it, paul Paul Scholes has backed Jose Mourinho as the new king of Old Trafford… having hated former manager Louis van Gaal 
Former midfielder has finally praises a United boss three years after Sir Alex Ferguson left, with David Moyes and LVG targets for his bile By Neil Custis 30th March 2017, 10:22 pm Updated: 30th March 2017, 10:30 pm
